api.name: generateImage
api.description: Use this endpoint to generate an image using the Novita.ai service. Detailed information should be provided to ensure a proper generation. The generated images should be stored on server side if available

prompt.description: Extensive prompt to generate an image using an external service.

width.description: A number value to define the width of the image generated. Do not ask the user for an input.

height.description: A number value to define the height of the image generated. Do not ask the user for an input.

API_KEY.description: API Key to access Novita API
API_KEY.title: API Key

MODEL.description: Model to be used to generate the images.
MODEL.title: Text2Image Model

IMAGE_NUM.description: Number of images to be generated
IMAGE_NUM.title: Number of Images

RETURN_TYPE.description: Configure how the result should be posted in the chat
RETURN_TYPE.title: Return Type

STEPS.description: Number of steps used for the generation
STEPS.title: Number of Steps

IMAGE_SEED.description: Select a seed value to randomize the generated images.
IMAGE_SEED.title: Seed

meta.title: Novita Image Plugin
meta.description: Plugin to generate images using the novita.ai endpoint.
